name: WACKER CHEMIE AG
membership: WACKER is member of VCI (German Chemical Industry Association), BWE (German Association of Wind Energy) and SolarPower Europe and a few others less related to activities falling under the transparency register.
goal:
Vision: We develop intelligent solutions for sustainable growth.
WACKER, as an innovative chemical company, makes a vital contribution to improving the quality of life around the world.
In the future, we want to continue developing and supplying solutions that meet our rigorous demands: creating added value for our customers and shareholders, and growing sustainably.
euInitiatives: We are following EU initiatives/policies on Trade, Energy, Energy Policies, Industrial Development
